message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value to you, I am offering it for $1250000. This exceptional opportunity won't last long, so I encourage you to consider this offer carefully.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of your product, but I'm looking to keep my expenses within a certain budget. Could we possibly negotiate the price down to $1000000?
